rows.label: qst650515_msg0001
rows.name:
This is the World Tree. The 7th
Perimeter Skyport, to be exact.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0002
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] "Skyport"...? I had my
suspicions before, but now
it's almost certain...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0003
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Their "World Tree" is a man-made
structure, just like I thought...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0004
rows.name:
It's truly remarkable... The Bionis
and the Mechonis are very tall, but
this structure is likely larger still.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah, it's much bigger than the White
Whale too. Just look at how small the
surface of Alst looks from here...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0006
rows.name:
Believe it or not, there's a man who
made it up here all by himself...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0007
rows.name: By himself?

rows.label: qst650515_msg0008
rows.name:
That incredible! Even we
needed to pool our strength
together to make it...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0009
rows.name:
It seems inefficient. A single person's
abilities are sorely limited.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0010
rows.name:
That's exactly why we form combat
units and away teams. Together, we
achieve what alone we couldn't.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0011
rows.name: I agree.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0012
rows.name:
In a sense, a Driver and their Blade
are an example of such a unit. A whole
greater than the sum of its parts.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0013
rows.name: Definitely!

rows.label: qst650515_msg0014
rows.name:
It's only because I had
Hikari, Homura, and all of
you, that I made it this far.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0015
rows.name:
And now you also also have KOS-MOS
Re:, Elma, and us by your side...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0016
rows.name:
Affirmative. My prognostic heuristics
suggest that this should allow us to
attain even higher performance levels.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0017
rows.name: Anyway, it's very mysterious...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0018
rows.name: What's that?

rows.label: qst650515_msg0019
rows.name:
...Just, the reason we've all
gathered... or *were* gathered here.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0020
rows.name:
It's like the Nopon Archsage
said, right? How it was his
dream, or something...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0021
rows.name: Yes, right. He did say that.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0022
rows.name:
But I feel like there must be some
purpose, some meaning to this meeting.
I don't know why, but it rings true.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0023
rows.name:
Ah, sorry. I'm just
being weird, I guess.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0024
rows.name:
No, don't apologize. Truthfully,
I feel something similar, Elma.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0025
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] It reminds me of the words
I heard that time...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0026
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] All life, walking hand in hand...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0027
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] It's a little like what we're
doing now, isn't it? I'd like
to think so, anyway...

rows.label: qst650515_msg0028
rows.name:
Everyone. You appear to be enjoying
the conversation. Does this mean that
the reconnaissance mission is over?

rows.label: qst650515_msg0029
rows.name:
Ack! I completely forgot about
that! Come on, let's keep going
and put this thing to bed.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0030
rows.name:
Agreed. There's a lot
we've got to do still.

rows.label: qst650515_msg0031
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] I must learn what I can from this
world, and use that knowledge to
crack Mira's secrets wide open...
